overview.en: The Linkyex Token or LT, is a Token based on ethereum’s 2.0 smart contract. Linkyex pioneered the“synchronizing release of dual mode minning”mechanism to complete the release of LT. LT issued a total of 3394500000 and promised never increase issues in stocks. Linkyex will distribute 100% of the revenue to LT holders on schedule.
overview.zh: 链币(Linkyex Token 简称:LT)是基于以太坊2.0智能合约的代币。链汇Linkyex的权益证明，拥有“双模式挖矿同步释放”机制。LT发行总量为3394500000枚，且承诺永不增发。链汇Linkyex 会将全部收入及时分配给LT的持有者。
